text: Juan de Dios Martínez Mera (9 March 1875 - 27 October 1955) was President of Ecuador from 1932 to 1933. In Quito, a main avenue is named after him. ==Other websites== * Biography of President Juan de Dios Martínez Mera * Enciclopedia del Ecuador por Efrén Avilés Pino Category:1875 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil
title: Juan de Dios Martínez
